<!-- BEGIN ww hard-gate -->
<script>
(function () {
  // ====== ÈÖçÁΩÆÂå∫ ======
  var PASSWORD    = "mimacuowu";   
  var TRIES       = 3;             
  var LOCK_MIN    = 1;            
  var STORE_KEY   = "ww_fail_v1";  
  var REDIRECT_TO = "/";           

  function denyAndRedirect(msg){
    var html = `
      <h2 style="text-align:center;margin-top:20%;color:#c00;font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;">
        ‚õî Access Denied ‚õî<br>${msg}<br><br>
        Redirecting to homepage in 3 seconds‚Ä¶
      </h2>`;
    document.open(); document.write(html); document.close();
    setTimeout(function(){ location.href = REDIRECT_TO; }, 3000);
  }

  var now = Date.now();
  var failData = { count: 0, lockedUntil: 0 };
  try {
    failData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORE_KEY)) || failData;
  } catch(e){}

  if (now < failData.lockedUntil) {
    denyAndRedirect("This page is temporarily locked. Please try again later.");
    return;
  }

  failData.count = 0;
  localStorage.setItem(STORE_KEY, JSON.stringify(failData));

  var ok = false;
  for (var i = 0; i < TRIES; i++) {
    var left = (TRIES - i);
    var input = prompt("üîí This page is restricted. (" + left + " attempt" + (left>1?"s":"") + " left)");
    if (input === null) { // ÂèñÊ∂à
      break;
    }
    if (input === PASSWORD) { ok = true; break; }
    else { failData.count++; }
  }

  if (!ok) {
    failData.lockedUntil = now + LOCK_MIN * 60 * 1000;
    localStorage.setItem(STORE_KEY, JSON.stringify(failData));
    denyAndRedirect("Access denied.");
    return;
  }

})();
</script>
<!-- END ww hard-gate -->

    align-items: center;

    width: 46px;

    box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);

  .ww-social a:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px) scale(1.06);

  }
  .ww-social a img {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    object-fit: contain;
    border-radius: 8px;
    display: block;
  }
  @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
    .ww-social a,
    .ww-social a:hover { transition: none; transform: none; }
  }
</style>
